name: Castle Defender (itch) (Gumtie Games)
description:
Castle Defender is my very first game! It is very short and simple, but I learned a lot from making it. It was made over the course of about three days. I may work on it more if it gets any love, but it was really just made for the experience! Thanks for checking it out. Feedback welcome!

Simply click to fire at the incoming dragons and survive as long as possible!
